body: 3 years ago today, my mom took me to the store to get a Minecraft card. I told all my friends (I was in 6th grade then) that I was getting Minecraft and one of them gave me the ip to this server. This was the first server I joined and was very excited to play MC for the first time. My IGN was skipp18 at the time, but it was sadly hacked. (I just got it back). The same year on christmas, I got this account that I play on now. I had so many amazing memories on this server, like where one memory was when my brother got tempbanned for 2 hours, for "hacking", even though he barely started playing Minecraft, which was funny. Well, I am happy that I joined this server and it is considered as my home server.
